attributes.action: Abolish the rule that EMA payments can only be made to students to have a household income of £30,000 or less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the current time, only certain students are elible for the EMA payment scheme. This is unfair as all students need the same equipment and the ones whose parents earn over the threshold to be eigble for the scheme may not and in most cases will not willingly give money to their children to purchase the needed equipment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
